{{also|horen|hoeren|Horen|Hören}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|hōren}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*hauzijaną}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|de}} {{m|ine-pro|*h₂ḱh₂owsyéti}}. Compare Dutch {{m|nds|horen}}, English {{m|en|hear}}, Danish {{m|da|høre}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈhøːrən/|[ˈhøːʁən]|[ˈhøːrən]}} {{a|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈhøːɐn/|/høːɐ̯n/|/hœɐ̯n/}} {{a|common speech}} * {{audio|de|De-hören.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-hören.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{rhymes|de|øːʀən}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|hört|hörte|gehört}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[hear]] {{gloss|to perceive sounds (or a sound) through the ear}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[listen]] to, [[pay attention]] to {{gloss|to give (someone) one's attention}} # {{lb|de|transitive|of a lecture}} to [[attend]], to [[go]] to, to [[sit in on]] # {{lb|de|transitive|of a radio signal}} to [[get]], to [[receive]] # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[listen]] {{gloss|to pay attention to a sound or speech; to accept advice or obey instruction}} # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[hear]] {{gloss|to receive information; to come to learn}} # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[hear]] {{gloss|to be contacted (by)}} ====Usage notes==== ''Hören'' can be used in a so-called "accusative with infinitive" construction (as in English): ''Ich '''hörte''' ihn rufen.'' – “I '''heard''' him call.” If such a sentence is in the perfect or pluperfect tense, the infinitive usually replaces the past participle: ''Ich hatte ihn rufen '''hören'''.'' – “I had '''heard''' him call.” The use of the past participle instead does occur in some speakers, but is ungrammatical to many others. ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|hör|gehört|h}} ====Derived terms==== {{top2}} * {{l|de|aufhören}} * {{l|de|gehören}} * {{l|de|hellhörig}} * {{l|de|herhören}} * {{l|de|hörbar}} * {{l|de|Hörbereich}} * {{l|de|Hörbuch}} * {{l|de|Hörer}} * {{l|de|hörig}} * {{l|de|Hörnerv}} * {{l|de|Gehör}} {{mid2}} * {{l|de|Hörsaal}} * {{l|de|hörsam}} * {{l|de|Hörschärfe}} * {{l|de|Hörvermögen}} * {{l|de|Hörweite}} * {{l|de|mithören}} * {{l|de|verhören}} * {{l|de|überhören}} * {{l|de|zuhören}} {{bottom}} ====Related terms==== {{top2}} * {{l|de|gehorsam}} {{mid2}} * {{l|de|horchen}} {{bottom}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Swedish== ===Verb=== {{head|sv|verb form}} # {{sv-verb-form-pre|höra|plural of=hör}} # {{sv-verb-form-imp|höra|plural of=hör}} #: '''''Hören''', I döve;
